name: CAMPBELL'S® Tuna Pasta Salad with Celery and Herbs
author: Campbell's Canada
summary: Broth adds lots of flavor to this summer classic that is sure to be a hit at your next BBQ.
ingredients: 1 (900 ml) carton CAMPBELL'S® 30% Less Sodium Ready To Use Seafood Broth
2 stalks celery stalks with leaves, sliced
½ medium red onion, finely chopped
½ teaspoon fresh cracked black pepper
directions: In a large pot, bring broth and pasta to a boil
Reduce heat and simmer until pasta is al dente and most of the liquid has been absorbed, about 10 minutes
In a large bowl, whisk together mayonnaise and lemon juice
Add the tuna, celery stalks and leaves, onion, and cooled pasta; season with salt, pepper, and parsley
